name: Timelord
overview: In the year 3295, time is a medium which can be traveled by an elite few. Most of these TimeLords, as they are referred to by common folk, follow strict non-interference guidelines as set down by the Time Guild. Accidents happen, though, and the ambition of some can affect the future of all civilization. It is up to you to pit the worlds of the past, present and future back on track.
